snippet.title: Desecrators Full Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Desecrators is a retro FPS inspired by '90s six-degrees-of-freedom shooters. Plunder your way through the galaxy to destructive weapons and technology powerful enough to take on the ultimate heist: The legendary vaults of the Galactic Treasury.

Desecrators version 1.0 releases February 28th, 2025.
Wishlist or purchase in early access here - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1311570/Desecrators/

Video Editor: Biodegradable (Twitter@BiodeEditable) - https://biodegradable68.wixsite.com/editservices
Sound Designer & Composer: Ben Micallef - https://www.benmicallefaudio.com/
Perp Games - https://perpgames.com
